title: Where/ how are you able to access your runes/ champion item builds in the new client?
body:
I can not find them, and I looked somewhat hard..



So........

RITO HALP PLEASE

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, you can find Runes and Masteries under the **Collections** tab. I've provided a screenshot to assist visually: 

http://imgur.com/a/UUfIA

Let me know if you have any questions.
Item builds aren't in the new client and you have to switch back to the old client for them but for runes/masteries they are under the collection tab.
